department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada(DFO), is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of Hydraulic Platform and delivery to Baie-Comeau Quebec (Qc), as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Hydraulic Platform - Request for Proposal

**Tender Details:**

*   **Reference Number**: WS4223358374-Doc4223497116
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Publications Date**: 2023-10-27
*   **Tender Closing Date**: **2023-11-14T14:00:00**
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Request for Proposal Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of a hydraulic platform. The platform will be delivered to Baie-Comeau, Quebec.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Material: Hydraulic Platform
*   Delivery Location: Baie-Comeau, Quebec
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal

**Buyer Information:**

*   Buyer: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
*   Buyer Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposal evaluation will be based on the lowest price among all qualified proposals.

**Contract Language and Trade Agreements:**

The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) trade agreement.

**Notice Details:**

*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Notice ID: 17848698
*   Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17848698?extsite=MTc4NDg2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Timeline:**

*   Tender Closing Date: **2023-11-14T14:00:00**
*   Contract Commencement Date: TBD

**Contact:**

Please contact Melanie Parent at melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any further information regarding this Request for Proposal.

**File Attachments:**

Click on the Notice URL to access the complete Request for Proposal document.  A link can be found in the popup page. Please search by tender number: WS4223358374-Doc4223497116. Complete documents, including reformatted attachments from the PDF document, will be posted under the "POSTED SELECTION CRITERIA" and "POSTED EVALUATION CRITERIA" section
